content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was commanded to browse a website for customs and traditions around the world. The command returned an article with information on various customs and traditions, including gift-giving in China and the Netherlands, punctuality norms in different countries, and cultural greetings in different countries. I used the command get_text_summary to summarize the article, which revealed that the article discusses 11 surprising customs and traditions from around the world, but does not provide specific examples in the given text. However, the command get_text_summary returned an HTTP 404 error, indicating that the text does not discuss any customs or traditions. Upon further browsing, my computer returned that the article does not provide specific examples of the 11 surprising customs from around the world. The rest of the text promotes booking small-group adventures and encourages readers to sign up for a newsletter to save on trips, and mentions the use of cookies to improve the user's experience on the website. Links to various trips were also provided."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not mention any customs or traditions. It simply informs the reader that a page cannot be found and suggests they return to the homepage. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\nBuzzFeed logo\\n\\n\\n (https://www.buzzfeed.com/?utm_source=dynamic&utm_campaign=404-errorpage)', 'Return to BuzzFeed.com (https://www.buzzfeed.com/?utm_source=dynamic&utm_campaign=404-errorpage)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.worldnomads.com/explore/culture", "question": "What are some of the customs and traditions mentioned in the article?"}}}'}]
"""
